cves.description: This is a script that exploits a known vulnerability (CVE-2019-15107) in web applications, allowing an attacker to inject commands on the target server. It takes a file containing a list of target URLs as input and attempts to find vulnerable URLs. It should only be used for security testing and with proper authorization.
CVE-2018-6389: WordPress <= 4.9.x 拒绝服务(DOS)漏洞
